headline: Top Picks 2026- WW Grainger Inc. Notes GWW
summary: The WW Grainger Inc. (GWW) 4.45% senior notes due 10/1/2035 are rated A2 with a Positive outlook by Moody’s and A+ with a Stable outlook by Standard & Poor’s. These securities are recommended for low-risk, tax-deferred portfolios. Interest payments are taxed as ordinary income, writes Martin Fridson, editor of Forbes/Fridson Income Securities Investor.
